title: How Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Rewrote the Celebrity Baby Announcement Rules
sub_head: Under layers of gemstones and vintage fashion, the singer offered a highly accessorized take on the now-ubiquitous maternity shoot.
body:
Pop superstar Rihanna and rapper A$AP Rockyâ€™s baby will be entertainment-industry royalty.
As of Friday, he or she is already wearing coronation-level jewels.
